Description:
Title: Luxury Real Estate AgentLocation: DubaiCompany: ABH Real EstateCompany Description:A leading Real Estate agency based in Dubai & Qatar, focused on Luxury properties, awarded best luxury Real estate brokerage for 2022 & 2023 and most lead generated winner on Property Finder for 2021.Job Description:We are seeking experienced and motivated real estate agents to join our team. As a real estate agent, you will be responsible for assisting clients in buying, selling, and renting properties, as well as negotiating contracts and managing client relationships. You will work closely with other members of the team to provide excellent customer service and help clients find what they seek.RESPONSIBILITIES:Assist clients in buying, selling, and renting properties
Conduct property showings
Negotiate contracts and agreements
Prepare and deliver client presentations
Provide excellent customer service and maintain strong client relationships
Work closely with other team members to ensure smooth transactions and positive outcomes for clients
Attend team meetings and training sessions as requiredUNIQUE BENEFITS YOU WILL GET:Qualified leads
Competent Administrative And Marketing Support
An Attractive Remuneration
Training and supportive work environSkills
Skills:
Proven track record of excellent sales skills
Knowledge in GCC market and sales
Strong communication, closing and negotiation skills
Fluent in English
Preferably Valid driving license and car
Good customer service skills
Self-motivated and driven to succeed
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Strong organizational and time management skills
